00042 /**
00043   * @brief A class to process the covariate command line
00044   */
00045 class CovariateParams
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049   static const std::string m_CNReferencePrefix;
00050 
00051   static std::map<string, int> m_allCovariateMap;       // all CovariateEnum-s from the cmd line listed in the order of
00052                                                         // CNProbeSet::m_vAllCovariates (which is the same as the order
00053                                                         // of covariates in the reference)
00054 
00055   static std::vector<int> m_vSignalCovariates;          // indices into CNProbeSet::m_vAllCovariates showing the cmd line order
00056   static std::vector<int> m_vLRCovariates;              // indices into CNProbeSet::m_vAllCovariates showing the cmd line order
00057   static std::vector<int> m_vAPCovariates;              // indices into CNProbeSet::m_vAllCovariates showing the cmd line order
00058 
00059 public:

00061

00068 
00069   // Signal methods

00074

00080

00093   static void initializeAdditionalAPParams(const string& apParameter);
